name: Money Master
description:
Suitable for all ages,
The typical monopoly game for the whole family.

1-5 people can play on the same computer.

■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■

The game uses the most classic real estate monopoly type of play.

Let your characters move on the map by throwing dice.
You may encounter fate, opportunity, or land that you can buy.

Buy the land and build a higher building each time you pass.
When someone enters your land, you can charge a large fee crossing !!

The ultimate goal is to make all other characters go bankrupt and become real estate monopoly!

In addition to the land, there are still many fate events!

■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■■

The characters are cute, the real estate is exquisite, and the rules are easy to understand!

Whether it is parent-child, friend, classmate, family.
Give you the most classic happy hour.

Just the price of a cup of milk tea!
